delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Recipe {{ id }}?

help.name: Name of recipe in language of recipe
help.preparationTimeMinutes: Average time needed for overall recipe preparation, defined in minutes
help.numberOfPortions: Number of portions for which all quantities are specified
help.authorId: Id of recipe's author. Id of User entity retrieved from gateway service
help.isVisible: Flag specifying if recipe should be visible in list of author's recipes
help.language: Language tag of a recipe as ISO_639-1 code
help.totalGramsWeight: Total weight in grams of meal prepared from recipe

recipesRecipe.created: A new Recipe is created with identifier {{ param }}
recipesRecipe.updated: A Recipe is updated with identifier {{ param }}
recipesRecipe.deleted: A Recipe is deleted with identifier {{ param }}
